messages.message:
Hi Team, sharing some feedback on the Accuracy Tests feature:
• Currently, there’s no way for an end user to understand why an accuracy test failed
• The review page of a failed test cannot be opened
• Job IDs are not explicitly available, which makes providing details for debugging difficult
Example: https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/hub/apps/918b95a5-9809-4053-b942-619aa1d3d59a/accuracy

Can we improve the Accuracy Tests user experience?

cc: @Nithin
